entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Segmentation fault on ARMv7 platforms with .NET 6.0.33 #44747
  • Missing net9.0 Templates in Test Environment #44736

Closed

  • The error "Unable to find package Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset with version (= 10.0.100-alpha.1.24556.12)" appeared when creating the .NET project based on latest .NET SDK 10.0 with 17.12.0 Preview 5.0 #44703

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2578324 #44765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44764
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prevent copy/paste of password and warn #44761
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • [9.0.1xx] Avoid warning about empty NuGetPackageRoot in wpftmp projects #44742
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Install .NET 9.0 template #44740
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • allow reading all mcr image names #44738
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • Update source build prebuilts tarball #44762
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44729
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #44739
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create project templates target to 10.0 #44349
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Update tfm of dotnet/format test project to current #44498
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] improve SDK incremental builds by not running crossgen on inner loop builds #44726
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #44657
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable test timeout dump collection #44730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify file watching #44603
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Clean up polling file watcher #35712
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Clean up namespaces #44691
    untriaged
  • Fix publishing OCI image as tarball #44693
    Servicing-consider, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Multi arch containers #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • [9.0.2xx] Avoid warning about empty NuGetPackageRoot in wpftmp projects #44688
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
